thread.title: P Chiverton

author: P Chiverton
title: P Chiverton
text: I was a little hesitant at first to use a company I had only ever heard of from Facebook, but was tempted by a trial offer. I have a young Golden Retriever who has a very sensitive stomach, and an older Westie. Both of them absolutely love this food- and can't get enough of the wet food either. Most of which frankly smells and looks so nice that it wouldn't look out of place on a dinner plate. Every query has been dealt with quickly and with utter professionalism and in a great manner by facebook staff. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.
